actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that all athletic teams from the United States should refuse to participate in any sports event with athletic teams from the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that U.S. athletic teams should refuse to participate in sporting events with Soviet athletic teams.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that all athletic teams from the United States should refuse to participate in any sports event with athletic teams from the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics.
